english.segment1: Who you gonna throw in the lake of fire, O God our lord?. Who you gonna throw when the flames get higher, O God our lord?. The devil and the man with the dark desire, O God our lord. The devil and the man with the dark desire, O God our lord.
english.segment2: O God our lord, o God our lord. Who you gonna throw in the lake of fire, O God our lord, o God our lord.
english.segment3: Will my name be there when the books are opened, O God our lord. Will my name be there when the books are opened, O God our lord. You better know now, don't just be hoping, O God our lord. You better know now, don't just be hoping, O God our lord.
english.segment4: O God our lord, o God our lord. Well my name be there when the books are opened, O God our lord, o God our lord.
english.segment5: Who's outside of the holy city, O God our lord. Tell me, who's left out of the holy city, O God our lord. The liar and the thief and the ones half ready, O God our lord. The liar and the thief and the ones half ready, O God our lord.
english.segment6: O God our lord, o God our lord. Tell me who's left out of the holy city, O God our lord, o God our lord.
english.segment7: My, my, my lord. I'm crying out to you master, oh lord, Don't you know I need you, oh lord. Have mercy on a poor sinner like me, oh jesus. Don't you know I need you, oh lord.
